TopicTitle: NAS Naval Artillery System appears to be corrupted.

Articles.Content: After installing NAS, KSP immediately locked up, and I found one of the folders was corrupted and preventing KSP from loading something. It also seemed to produce a small buzzing noise in the left side of my headphones. I cannot seem to remove it or alter it in any way. Is anyone able to figure out what's up?
H.i the mods thread is the best place to ask about a specific mod
